sentence.Network_en: Intellectuality and rationality can not directly deal with these ultra logical categories.
sentence.Network_cn: 知性、理性无法直接面对这些超逻辑的范畴.

sentence.Network_en: Services - Oriented application integration within the grid computing environment requires high automatization, dynamic and intellectuality.

sentence.Network_en: Emotional representation and artistic intellectuality are two important factors in works of art.
sentence.Network_cn: 情感表现和艺术知性是分析艺术作品的两个重要纬度.
